issue.title: Translation changes
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Some translation changes has been brought in en-GB and fr-FR locales

*en-GB files to integrate in repository*
* attachment:en-GB.pkg_easysdi.sys.ini
* attachment:en-GB.com_easysdi_core.sys.ini
* attachment:en-GB.mod_easysdi_adminbutton.sys.ini
* attachment:en-GB.mod_easysdi_admininfo.sys.ini

*translation files to integrate in repository*
Build translated archive from localization platform

---


**Fixed versions :** 4.1.0
